episodes.dirkText: See? I whipped up something special, just for you, since you must be so curious to see how the next interviews will go.
Does this soothe your need? Pacify your insatiable lust for more entertainment?
Look, there‚Äôs even the Problem Sleuth crew.
We all love the Problem Sleuth crew. Unless you haven‚Äôt read Problem Sleuth, which is a problem in and of itself.
I‚Äôm not keen on promoting literature that isn‚Äôt either deeply philosophical or written by me, but go fucking read Problem Sleuth.
And yes, in case you were wondering, My Little Pony does count as deeply philosophical literature.
This is much better.

In fact, now that I‚Äôm looking at it, my art has made drastic leaps and bounds in terms of quality since the last time you would have seen it. When was that again, 2011? I suppose it‚Äôs not too surprising that I‚Äôm a far more talented artist than my 15-year-old counterpart.
Now, I‚Äôm not going to completely upturn the episode‚Äôs plot ‚Äì or lack thereof ‚Äì I‚Äôm not a monster.
It was not at all because I couldn‚Äôt be bothered to give a fuck about this dumb story.
The only change I felt was necessary to make was giving the shadowed figure a stylish hoverboard. This episode is miles better already, thanks to my impeccable creative talent and directional skills.
For today‚Äôs episode preview, we must bear witness to what is probably the most ordinary episode idea of all time.
I understand the target audience craves meaningless fluff, nothing too thought-provoking or realistic, but this show has a way of taking it to a whole new level.
Doing an already stale and overdone trope in a manner that recites verbatim the beach episodes of old‚Ä¶ Their plastic smiles look so happy. So fake. Frankly, it makes me sick.
It can‚Äôt get any worse than a beach episode, can it?

Alright. This is my new and improved beach episode. I‚Äôve basically solved the problem. Instead of that hoity-toity high fashion Homeslice Dirk, there is now me, the cooler Better Dirk. Fuck the Ultimate title. We‚Äôre going Better for this shit.
I wonder‚Äì could I replace Homeslice Dirk entirely and see how many episodes it takes for anyone to notice?
Nah. That‚Äôs too cruel.
Anyways. You know the drill. Check back tomorrow for more.
Ah. Strider House. I am immediately proved wrong.
Actually, no. This is perfect.
I don‚Äôt know what the plot is supposed to be, but this is fucking perfect.
Going all-in on the show‚Äôs theme, plagiarizing the very idea of one of the finest sitcoms of the 20th century. Full House. Strider House. It‚Äôs beautiful.
Ms. Paint‚Äôs eye for artistic perfection knows no bounds, don‚Äôt you think?
Just joking. My eye for artistic perfection is infinitely more refined than hers.
Now, this is truly flawless. Immaculate, even.
It‚Äôs true to its name‚Äì a house full of Striders, a dream come true.
Of course, out of courtesy to my brother, and to the Strider title, I kept him in there.
Poor guy. Must be overwhelmed by the sheer amount of Di-Stri kickassery going on.
This is the perfect episode. This is the Strider House.
You know the drill. Tomorrow, again. And the day after that. Should I even have to remind you anymore?
Now there‚Äôs‚Ä¶ Someone with an Ouija board.
Who doesn‚Äôt remember those things? It looks like those ghost-divining instruments of internet infamy have found a home in the story.
The girl holding the board seems familiar. Should I state her name or would that count as spoilers?
Hmmm. You‚Äôre all very lucky I‚Äôm a merciful narrator, so I‚Äôll hold off on saying anything, just for you.
The concept looks somewhat promising, but it‚Äôll probably miss the mark, just like every other pathetic episode they‚Äôve planned.
Bam. Decided to take a couple of left turns and mix things up a little. I chose not to stick to the composition this time. Gotta make sure my art is unique, y‚Äôknow.
You see this shit? I don‚Äôt need an Ouija Board to talk to ghosts. I‚Äôm above that. I take the ghosts in the palm of my hand and fucking strangle them.
Those dudes on paranormal shows wish they were me. They lack the sheer paranormal power I possess.
That type of entertainment will pale in comparison to the beauty of this episode.
I am going to ghost-wrangle those concepts and deliver them with haunting perfection.
See you tomorrow then.
Finally, something interesting.
Here we see Karkat Vantas, a gun ominously framing his tied-up body. I give my regards to the lighting crew. They‚Äôve done well.
But onto something more important‚Äì am I witnessing a kidnapping? Is Ms. Paint televising a kidnapping?
Her character alignment has just become True Evil. Shame on her, that murder hobo.

With all these shitty references I‚Äôm making, I can only pray Ms. Paint isn‚Äôt planning on making a D&D episode. No offense meant to her, of course, but the intricacies of such a subject will be lost to her inexperience. It‚Äôs best to leave the complexities to me.
All in all, this episode might manage to rile up a few viewers.
How about this?
I shut him up. This probably marks me as an accomplice, but it‚Äôs not like I‚Äôll get caught.
I‚Äôm simply rectifying the only issue that stood out to me; they forgot to tape over Vantas‚Äô mouth.

If you‚Äôre going to kidnap someone, then at least do it right. Especially when kidnapping the guy that‚Äôs probably the loudest troll on Earth C?  Be prepared to have vulgar insults and vile slurs thrown your way.
Okay, maybe the slurs are pushing it a little these days. But am I wrong? (The answer is no, by the way. I am never wrong.)
Well, I guess keeping him at gunpoint would shut him up a little. We‚Äôll see how that goes.

Today‚Äôs preview was spicier than most, don‚Äôt you think? I hope you‚Äôre quaking in your seat at the thought of more. I don‚Äôt ‚Äúhope‚Äù, actually‚Äì I know that you are. You want more, don‚Äôt you?
Then I‚Äôll see you tomorrow.
John blowing dream bubbles?
Okay. Not sure how this is supposed to translate into a fun and happy form of entertainment, but I‚Äôm sure Ms. Paint‚Äôs directorial abilities will pull through in the end.
Are we getting troll throwbacks? Dancestor cameos? Silly dead people antics? What‚Äôs in store here? The suspense and intrigue are killing me.
Look at me fucking go. Dirk Strider, ass out, caked up on a hot summer day.
John is blowing bubbles of perfection that border on downright pornographic, and I wouldn‚Äôt have it any other way.
I‚Äôm sticking up the middle finger in rebellion. I‚Äôve got a fucking horse. I‚Äôm flexing my sweet and sexy muscles. How erotic (horse unrelated.)
Call me Narcissus, but I‚Äôve lost track of what the original idea here was supposed to be. Too busy looking at my risque bod.
I think I‚Äôve kept the porn gag going on for too long.
Shut it down, guys. Shut it down. Don‚Äôt want to make any of our audience on the other end uncomfortable.
Children, avert your gaze. Everything here is lollipops and ponies.
That‚Äôs enough Dirk-isms from me for a day.

I‚Äôm being lenient on you all here, so be grateful. I could easily talk forever and fill the space of this empty website with nothing but orange text, but I don‚Äôt think you would like that very much.
Though that‚Äôs what I‚Äôm doing already, isn‚Äôt it? Just one day at a time.
Expect more orange text tomorrow. I keep my word, you know this.
An episode centered around Terezi Pyrope and my little dojo business.
We‚Äôll get some fascinating fights and riveting action, but nothing too serious, or it‚Äôll throw off all the chill vibes.
Maybe there‚Äôll be a training montage here and there? Perhaps a saga about Pyrope becoming the next Bruce Lee?
Let‚Äôs make this the star-studded sequel to Return of the Dragon. Make a prequel to Way of the Dragon, while we‚Äôre at it.
It‚Äôs good to brush up on your 70‚Äôs karate flicks, get some inspiration from the originals.
It‚Äôd be dumb to pretend you don‚Äôt know who would be coming out on top though.
‚Ä¶ Me, obviously. Can‚Äôt you see it in this masterpiece?
Well, I suppose it‚Äôs not the better me - but I had to give the sweet taste of victory to this puny guy as well. I‚Äôm a very generous omnipotent being afterall.
Need a little bit of variety in my exquisite work too, other Dirks can have the spotlight sometimes. even if they‚Äôre merely sub-par compared to yours truly.

Oh and while we‚Äôre at it, can I say I‚Äôm tired of being twinkified? I‚Äôm not mad, it‚Äôs just so unrealistic. My muscles are actually near Herculean in nature, maybe even more than that if we‚Äôre really being honest.
Therefore I‚Äôve taken the liberty of making it clearer in this artwork. big fat humongous fucking muscles. only fit for a true alpha like myself. You can thank me later.
I‚Äôve been talking quite a lot about my figure these days, huh? I bet you didn‚Äôt even know I could shapeshift in this form.

I mean, it should be obvious considering I am literally god. It works wonders for charades too. Though it‚Äôs not like I have anyone to play with.. unless we‚Äôre counting myself who I made from myself, who I endearingly call: myself.
Anyhoo. I‚Äôve babbled on enough, even though I‚Äôm sure you absolutely adore hearing (..reading?) me talk.
Yeah, I know about all the fanmail, freaks. Keep at it, you of all ‚Äúpeople‚Äù know I love attention. Tchau.
Vantas in an IKEA‚Äì excuse me‚Äì IGEA, night guard outfit?
Surprising. Looks like he finally landed a job where he can‚Äôt inconvenience anyone by spouting vulgar insults in their faces.
It‚Äôs time to be held on the edge of your seats, the lingering feeling of dread holding you hostage. Will they be spotted? Will they be detained? Will there be jumpscares??
No. They‚Äôre in a fucking IGEA. This isn‚Äôt going to be some John Carpenter horror movie type of deal, and it would be stupid to make it seem so.
Honestly, this one is kind of a cop-out. Dedicated readers already know that John, Dave, and Terezi are hiding from Karkat. Didn‚Äôt last year‚Äôs trailer have nearly an identical image?
Here, how‚Äôs this.
I know that the fans are frothing at the mouth for even the slightest peek into what‚Äôs being planned for the future, especially you dirty shippers.
And who am I to withhold new content from our ravenous fans? Here‚Äôs another scene, just for you.
Enjoy it, theorize on it, even write elaborate fanfiction of this single frame. I know you‚Äôre capable of it.
Have fun with this one.
See you again soon.
Something is certainly happening.
I don‚Äôt know what the fuck I‚Äôm supposed to write here. I am literally just standing.
No offense to the cameraman here, but how is this supposed to even entertain?
I guess I‚Äôll just have to take on this painstaking task myself and tell you guys that this episode is coming up very soon.
It‚Äôs not the next episode, no, but it‚Äôs the one after. We‚Äôre getting close to the end of the interviews.
That‚Äôs right, my dear audience, there‚Äôs more to Homeslice than just repetitive interviews. Who would‚Äôve thought?
Not you, probably. I knew, though. But I don‚Äôt think you‚Äôd like to hear me ramble about my omnipotence. There are only so many words this website can fit, after all.
On another note, I need to fix this. Something about this is irritating me.
Oh fuck yeah.
I‚Äôve got my glasses back.
It‚Äôs common sense that I never take off my glasses. Not even when sleeping.
I‚Äôve got an image to maintain, and if anyone dares see what my eyes look like under these glasses, all of my intrigue and mystery will disappear.
It‚Äôs truly my greatest fear. It‚Äôs true. I weep and shake like a miserable coward every time someone looks at my eyes.
Now that you‚Äôve seen them, dear viewer, how will I live?
Just kidding. Thought you had some Better Dirk emotional vulnerability time there?
Nah. The real reason I wear my glasses all the time is that they‚Äôre fucking cool.
Goodbye for now. See you tomorrow.
Oh fuck. It‚Äôs the Dersite agents in Midnight Crew attire.
Who remembers that old thing? Not many of you, I‚Äôm sure.
I know how many intermission skippers there are in this joint, you despicable, despicable many.
The Courtyard Droll and the Draconian Dignitary are both here, but Jack is the cameraman for this whole stint, and I decapitated the shit out of the Hegemonic Brute.
So, I wonder who‚Äôs going to be filling those vacant spots?
Everyone, drop what you‚Äôre doing and look at this right now.
It‚Äôs the Wayward Vagabond. It‚Äôs the fucking Mayor. Who gives a shit about the Midnight Crew when you‚Äôve got the Mayor, am I right?
Look at this guy. Everyone loves him. And there‚Äôs the Peregrine Mendicant, I guess. Good for her.
I feel I must add that I‚Äôm not intending to imply‚Äìwith this Picasso-esque artwork‚Äì that these two replace the empty positions in the Midnight Crew.
I just think that they should be the stars of the show.
Anyways. We‚Äôre nearing the end of this whole affair. Just a few more teasers to show, and then we‚Äôll be back to your regularly scheduled programming.
But I‚Äôm not gone just yet, so come back tomorrow.
And here we have Harley undergoing her evil scientist midlife crisis.
It‚Äôs about time, I would say. She‚Äôs making dangerous substances, poisonous gases, and wicked shit that is about to fucking blow.
She sure is a dangerous dog woman.
Just look at that evil smirk she‚Äôs got going for her.
Okay I can‚Äôt pretend anymore. This is fucking boring. I‚Äôm going to move on.
This is much more interesting.
She has a nuclear bomb, and she is going to rain hellfire on all of you unsuspecting folks at home. Be careful.
You thought what she was making before was bad? Pfft. That‚Äôs mere child‚Äôs play in comparison to this unit of a weapon.
Just look at her. Look at her innocent smile and empty eyes. Then look at how big that bomb is.
It‚Äôs gotta be at least two Jades tall. What a monster.
Her evil scientist midlife crisis is now complete with the murder of millions. It‚Äôs what she‚Äôd want.
I‚Äôm sure the most refined of Jade Harley appreciators will appreciate today‚Äôs humble teaser.
After all, a dog girl with a bomb is sure to excite anyone.
If this was up your alley, I think you‚Äôll like tomorrow‚Äôs teaser. How about it?
We‚Äôre getting an Evangelion reference in this shit? A mech episode in a sitcom?
It sounds like someone‚Äôs pushing the boundaries a little.
Ms. Paint is going to become the next Hideaki Anno. It‚Äôll become the most legendary episode in all of sitcom history.
Put me in, NERV, make me get in the fucking robot. I‚Äôll be the best Shinji the world has ever seen, and I won‚Äôt be such a sadboy cuck.
It‚Äôll be an enlightening performance.
Yeah, this is probably the best that Homeslice is ever going to get.
I‚Äôm in the robot. What more could a man ask for? I‚Äôve even got a hearty grin on my face and everything. I‚Äôm fucking ecstatic to be piloting this thing.
Much more grateful than Shinji would be, though I can‚Äôt blame the guy. It‚Äôs hard being a 14-year-old with daddy issues. It‚Äôs hard, and nobody understands.
Not even me, but that‚Äôs by choice. It‚Äôs not like I can‚Äôt easily understand the perspective of a repressed and fucked up 14-year-old‚Äì I‚Äôm near-omnipotent, for fucks sake.
I just choose not to because I‚Äôm not a fucking virgin loser. I‚Äôm infinitely cooler than all four (five, if we‚Äôre talking rebuilds) of the Evangelion kids combined.
Sorry, Kaworu. He‚Äôs the only real one in this entire series and the only character in there I respect. It‚Äôs probably because of his homosexual tendencies.
I wasn‚Äôt lying when I said this would be up your alley, was I? (The answer is no. I was not lying. I never lie.)
Hope you enjoyed it. Unfortunately for you, though, our fun is coming to an end soon.
That‚Äôs right, tomorrow is the last teaser. I saved the worst for last. Be prepared.
Ah. Great. A camping episode. With Egbert and I. I told you I was saving the worst for last, wasn‚Äôt I?
I am sincerely hoping there‚Äôs no hidden agenda for this episode. I‚Äôll even beg on my knees and pray.
Yes, I‚Äôll do it. I have no shame. At least the concept is more interesting than the beach episode from far earlier.
It‚Äôs just a little more unconventional. If I‚Äôll be honest, this is the one episode where I wish nothing happened.
You‚Äôve gotten this far, you know my deal with putting on a show. This shit, though? Get that out of my face. Separate me from that windsock blue boy. I barely even know the guy.
This is much more comfortable.
We‚Äôre a safe distance away from each other. I know that it may seem that my disturbance is unwarranted, but you haven‚Äôt witnessed what I have.
You haven‚Äôt seen the craved fangirls and their depraved obsessions with ship canonicity, squealing in hopes that their favorite yaoiboys finally mack on each other.
I know I‚Äôm dunking on the shippers a lot here, but it‚Äôs difficult being a gay man out in this cruel and unforgiving fictional world.
You put me sitting next to a straight guy a little too close, and everyone loses their fucking mind. It‚Äôs annoying, to say the least.
And that just about wraps everything up.
Were all the teasers to your liking? Sans this one, I mean. I‚Äôm sure they were‚Äì after all, the content drip feed is what you thirst for.
You‚Äôre parched, completely dried-out, and you need the juicy details of your favorite show to keep that sensation at bay.
I‚Äôd say I did a good job of delivering that, didn‚Äôt I? It was fun, wasn‚Äôt it? Of course, it was. Customer satisfaction is always guaranteed with me.

qna_aug_7_2022.dirkText: It‚Äôs the moment you‚Äôve all been waiting for with bated breath, asses poised on the edges of your seats, and eyes glued to the device of your preference.
The time has come for me to answer your questions. Let‚Äôs see what you‚Äôve sent in, shall we?
An alternate reality game? You could say that, sure, though I‚Äôm not too fond of the title.

I could push this to the extremes and make you go to the deserts of Nevada or the distant state of Ohio for the link to some other obscure website I made. Hell, I‚Äôll give you guys coordinates to some unknown, isolated island and see how that plays out.
If you want to call this an ARG, then I‚Äôd think that would suit your fancy.
Just kidding, of course. Putting together an elaborate game like that is more work than it‚Äôs worth, and I‚Äôve got much better things to do with my time.

qna_aug_7_2022.topText: ‚Äúi just want to see them all be happy.‚Äù
qna_aug_7_2022.dirkText: I understand. Unfortunately, happiness is a rare virtue that few can say they‚Äôve truly obtained. After all, life isn‚Äôt as easy as that, is it?
Sure. Would Full HD, 1920 x 1080 work for you?
Didn‚Äôt work the last time, not working now. You didn‚Äôt even put in the effort to get the name of the media right‚Äì this is Homeslice.

qna_aug_7_2022.topText: ‚Äúim in love with you‚Äù‚Äúkiss me  with tongue‚Äù‚Äúaurughrhfhrhjfithbghyghf a kiss on the chee k please‚Äù
qna_aug_7_2022.dirkText: You all need to calm the fuck down.

qna_aug_7_2022.topText: ‚Äúim in love with you‚Äù‚Äúkiss me  with tongue‚Äù‚Äúaurughrhfhrhjfithbghyghf a kiss on the chee k please‚Äù
qna_aug_7_2022.dirkText: I get it, I‚Äôm irresistible, but why do I get the fans that are teetering on the edge of downright insanity? Take a shower. Go outside. Feel the warm caress of the sun on your face. Anything but this.
Why is this even a question? I thought it was more than obvious.
One, there was a date in the trailer - August. Two, you saw the counter on page 20, didn‚Äôt you? It clearly indicates when the next update drops.
What, you think I put it there for the fun of it? Or maybe it was a countdown to some other unrelated event? Why would I do that?
Was that to your liking? I know the questions I answered weren‚Äôt very substantial‚Äî but I‚Äôm saving the good stuff for later. After all, I have to keep you coming back.
You‚Äôre probably assuming that I‚Äôm doing several of these Q&A‚Äôs now, and you would be right. Want a cookie for that guess?
I‚Äôll handpick a few questions, good or bad, every week. So, don‚Äôt whine like a spoiled baby if your question wasn‚Äôt answered today. It‚Äôll be answered eventually. Probably. No promises.

qna_aug_14_2022.dirkText: Welcome back. You‚Äôd better have missed me, because I‚Äôve got an interesting reveal lined up that I suspect you‚Äôll enjoy.

qna_aug_14_2022.topText: ‚ÄúWHERES CALIBORN I NEED TO SEE MY BAE‚Äù
qna_aug_14_2022.dirkText: Caliborn‚Äôs your bae? God. What is it with you people and your beyond-questionable romantic choices? I don‚Äôt see the appeal to that guy. But fuck it, I‚Äôll be nice and appease you.

qna_aug_14_2022.topText: ‚ÄúWHERES CALIBORN I NEED TO SEE MY BAE‚Äù
qna_aug_14_2022.dirkText: He shows up in something eventually. That‚Äôs all I‚Äôll say.
What a throwback. The nostalgia is almost killing me. It‚Äôs our beloved John Egberts considered name, a detail only a true Homestuck superfan would know.

You have my applause. Though, I don‚Äôt know why you brought your immense Homestuck knowledge to this askbox. If it was to flex your infinite wisdom on me, then good try, but it‚Äôs not working. I already know all of that. I don‚Äôt mean to brag, of course, I‚Äôm just humbly stating facts here.

qna_aug_14_2022.topText: ‚ÄúWho are you?‚Äù‚Äúwhat‚Äôs going to happen in homestuck 2?‚Äù
qna_aug_14_2022.dirkText: I am Dirk. Apparently, I‚Äôve been given the nickname Better Dirk, which I‚Äôm not complaining about. In fact, I‚Äôm inclined to agree.

qna_aug_14_2022.topText: ‚ÄúWho are you?‚Äù‚Äúwhat‚Äôs going to happen in homestuck 2?‚Äù
qna_aug_14_2022.dirkText: As for Homestuck 2‚Äì why would I know? Despite our similarities, I‚Äôm not the same as that Ultimate Dirk. Whatever he‚Äôs doing in his miserable little story is beyond me.

qna_aug_14_2022.topText: ‚ÄúWho are you?‚Äù‚Äúwhat‚Äôs going to happen in homestuck 2?‚Äù
qna_aug_14_2022.dirkText: And before you hit me with the ‚ÄúBut he‚Äôs ultimate self! He absorbed all his splinters!‚Äù No. He did not.

qna_aug_14_2022.topText: ‚ÄúWho are you?‚Äù‚Äúwhat‚Äôs going to happen in homestuck 2?‚Äù
‚ÄúWho are you?‚Äù‚Äúwhat‚Äôs going to happen in homestuck 2?‚Äù
qna_aug_14_2022.dirkText: As for how that was possible? You‚Äôll get an explanation soon enough if you ask nicely.
Wasn‚Äôt that interesting? Feel free to theorize about my very existence. The engagement would be nice.
Again, ask me more shit if you want, and come back next week. I‚Äôll cook up some spicy responses to what you‚Äôve already sent me in the meantime.

qna_aug_21_2022.dirkText: Sup. We‚Äôre elaborating on my top secret, super sexy Better Dirk lore I revealed last week.
Just hearing the word ‚Äúlore‚Äù has you shuddering with anticipation in your seat, doesn‚Äôt it? Well, it better be, because I think this week won‚Äôt disappoint.

qna_aug_21_2022.topText: ‚Äúam i a loser for liking homestuck‚Äù
‚ÄúDon‚Äôt interfere with the story right away Dirk! Don‚Äôt you know you‚Äôve gotta build up tension first BEFORE you pull a big stunt?‚Äù
qna_aug_21_2022.dirkText: ‚Ä¶What do you think I‚Äôm doing? Come on. If you think I‚Äôm going to pull out all the stops when Homeslice hasn‚Äôt even finished it‚Äôs first episode, you think far too little of me.

qna_aug_21_2022.topText: ‚ÄúI‚ÄôVE CONNECTED THE TWO DOTS!! better dirk are you digital??? like only digital i dont mean like ‚Äôyeah look im on your puter right now‚Äô i mean do you even have a body?? bc all we‚Äôve seen of you is a silhouette or you hijacking screens idk maybe im grasping at straws here :‚Äù
qna_aug_21_2022.dirkText: But yes, I have a body ‚Äì the ‚Äúsilhouette‚Äù you mention is my physical form. Just so happens that since I‚Äôm now divorced from the aforementioned webcomic, I‚Äôve got a mind of my own. Gaining sentience is great. I should‚Äôve tried it earlier, really.

qna_aug_21_2022.topText: ‚Äúcan we pwease have an explanation for how it was possible??? ü•∫ü•∫ü•∫ü•∫ (<-asking nicely)‚Äù
qna_aug_21_2022.dirkText: Thank you for asking nicely, I really appreciate it. No, I‚Äôm being completely sincere right now, I do appreciate some common decency in my asks. I don‚Äôt find it very often.

qna_aug_21_2022.topText: ‚Äúcan we pwease have an explanation for how it was possible??? ü•∫ü•∫ü•∫ü•∫ (<-asking nicely)‚Äù
qna_aug_21_2022.dirkText: I‚Äôd love to answer your question, but due to your unfortunate lack of clarity and the anonymity of the questions, I have not the faintest clue what you could possibly be referring to.

qna_aug_21_2022.topText: ‚Äúyou‚Äôre obviously not the dirk from homestuck we know, and obviously not from homeslice, so what are you?‚Äù
qna_aug_21_2022.dirkText: See? This is phrased better, just asked in a way that is slightly less nice. However, nice anon, I appreciate your effort in trying.

qna_aug_21_2022.topText: ‚Äúyou‚Äôre obviously not the dirk from homestuck we know, and obviously not from homeslice, so what are you?‚Äù
qna_aug_21_2022.dirkText:
Okay, so to answer the burning question. I‚Äôm Dirk from what you would call the GAME OVER timeline. Great plot twist, I know. You remember when I floated off into those glitches and was subsequently never seen again, right? I know that raises two questions.
One, how did I escape the timeline and get to where I am now?
And two, how did I not join the amalgamation of splinters and selves that is Ultimate Dirk?

qna_aug_21_2022.topText: ‚Äúyou‚Äôre obviously not the dirk from homestuck we know, and obviously not from homeslice, so what are you?‚Äù
qna_aug_21_2022.dirkText:
I‚Äôll answer question two, just because it‚Äôs the more palatable explanation.
The glitches in Sburb masked my now-distorted existence, and it also helped that I was rarely mentioned in Homestuck after that. Being mostly forgotten by the timeline‚Äôs remaining denizens meant I was forgotten by the machinations of the comic itself, save for the fucked-up part of Sburb I got stuck in. Time worked quite differently back there as well. I guess I‚Äôd describe it as akin to the feeling of being stuck in a black hole for years on end if I had to.

qna_aug_21_2022.topText: ‚Äúyou‚Äôre obviously not the dirk from homestuck we know, and obviously not from homeslice, so what are you?‚Äù
qna_aug_21_2022.dirkText: Leave it up to a Prince of Heart to attempt suicide in the most convoluted, ass-backward way possible.
Wasn‚Äôt that exciting? Look at us go. You‚Äôve broken my shell and got me to open up a little. You must be so incredibly proud of yourself. Good for you.
Come back next week because I just might spill how I ended up fucking with Homeslice. Or I might not. Who knows.

2024_crashout.dirkText: Another year passes‚Ä¶
Let's just get to the point, shall we.
Also, can we PLEASE render myself  in a more symbolic manner? I get the style consistency but this body doesn‚Äôt fit my demeanor.
Much better.
So, it's been a while, huh. Glad to see you back, etc etc. Who cares at this point. You're just here for the content.
I'm not judging by the way. Honestly, this website is the only interesting thing happening in this little universe. You can thank me for that.
Well, anyway.
Fuck yeah. Marvel at these creations.

This is going to be the next interview FINALLY, and almost the last one too. Yeah, we‚Äôve been here a while, but don't think the actual comic is just interviews after interviews. That sounds boring as fuck.
There are some more interesting episodes in the works, as you saw me demonstrate some of them here (<-link).

My versions are objectively better, but alas. I can't actually do much, yet. I can only tell you stories of what they could've been if they were written by yours truly. I'll let them have fun for a while longer. And after that‚Ä¶
Ah ah, don't think I'm going to spoil you.
You‚Äôd like that, wouldn't you? No, I need to keep some of you on the edge of your seats.
Ahem. As I was saying.
And guess who else is in this? That's right. The number 1 Strider, right here. Not me, but you get what I mean. Though that would be awesome as fuck. Imagine if I was in Homeslice. Imagine‚Ä¶
Here we have. Um. Jake with a roomba? Can‚Äôt say I had a hand in dreaming that up. Whatever, you‚Äôll see what happens.
I'm also there ‚Äì that is to say, Dirk is there. He looks just as bored of this particular panel as I am. The scene, I mean. My drawing is awesome.
I don't think the actual panels can top this. You won't see them for a while anyway, so you'll have to savor what you get from me right now.
Alright, this is a better scene, finally. I think you‚Äôll enjoy this one, it's quite entertaining. It's got some action, as should every good story, in my personal opinion of course.
That's it from me today, I won't show any more drawings. I do want to save the best for the actual release. Even if it won't be drawn by me. A shame, really.
I guess there's only one thing I can say now. Happy new year, or whatever.
Now‚Ä¶
Please, leave me the fuck alone. I have things to do around here and I do not need you nosy readers snooping around my turf. Have a good day.
You will be notified when you can come back.
